text: The Mayor of the District of Columbia each year in the annual estimates shall report to Congress the assignment of the market masters, assistant market masters, watchmen, and laborers to the various markets and offices.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-207.

1973 Ed., § 47-205.

DC CODE § 47-207

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Items included in annual estimates--Assignment of certain market employees.
